Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController

Class ChatController

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController.ChatController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class ChatController extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
ChatController class manages the chat component in the GUI. It handles displaying messages, selecting what chat to display and sending messages.

    • setCurrentlyDisplayedChat

      public void setCurrentlyDisplayedChat(String playerNickname)
      Sets the currently displayed chat and updates the chat.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - nickname of the player whose chat needs to be displayed, null or empty for the public chat.
